title: Snowday malz
body: Where is snowday malz its the 12/16/2014 but i cant see him in store, am i missing something :O

replies.body:
I bet its because, they meant 16th american time, 
if only they could be bothered just to change 1 little number when they put things on the oce website, it would save our entire server this hassle.
riot is disgraceful like that, I swear the people which make these notices suffer from cerebral palsy

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=eTAXiEGR,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2014-12-15T22:12:52.550+0000)
> I bet its because, they meant 16th american time, 
> if only they could be bothered just to change 1 little number when they put things on the oce website, it would save our entire server this hassle.

And here I am, waiting, on my birthday, expecting skins...

> [{quoted}](name=Xerioum,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=eTAXiEGR,comment-id=,timestamp=2014-12-15T21:40:31.522+0000)
>
> Where is snowday malz its the **12/16/2014** but i cant see him in store, am i missing something :O

Yes, you are missing something. There is no 16th month. Mind = Blown
Americans swap the days and months around because apparently the normal system isn't good enough
same for the other new skins...
